description: The unit of work requested for execution in a job list and a work request shall be defined as a job order. A job order references an associated work master.
title: Job order
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The work master applied to this job order.
The segment requirement(s) within the scope of an operations request that specifically relates to this job order.
The job order parameters related to this job order
The personnel requirement(s) related to this job order
The equipment requirement(s) related to this job order
The physical asset requirement(s) related to this job order
The material requirement(s) related to this job order

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the process segment

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

workType.title: Work type
workType.description: Describes the category of the activity
workType.comment: Required attribute. Possible values are: production, maintenance, quality, inventory, or mixed

oneOf.$comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories

workMasterID.title: Work master id
workMasterID.description: Identifies the associated work master to be used

workMasterVersion.title: Work master version
workMasterVersion.description: Identifies the version of the associated work master to be used.

segmentRequirementID.title: Segment requirement id
segmentRequirementID.description: A unique identification of the segment requirement within the scope of an operations request that specifically relates to the job order

startTime.title: Start time
startTime.description: When work is to be started.

endTime.title: End time
endTime.description: When work is to be completed.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The priority of the job order.

dispatchStatus.title: Dispatch status
dispatchStatus.description: Identifies the status of the entry from the perspective of the dispatch activity.

command.title: Command
command.description: Identifies the action the execution management activity is to perform on the job order.

commandRule.title: Command rule
commandRule.description: Instruction to execution management activities specifying conditions to execute the command.
